test.description: Include source maps for modules based on their extension (defaults to .js and .css)

include.description: Include source maps for module paths that match the given value

exclude.description: Exclude modules that match the given value from source map generation

filename.description: Defines the output filename of the SourceMap (will be inlined if no value is provided)

oneOf.description: Disable separate SourceMap file and inline SourceMap as DataUrl

append.description: Appends the given value to the original asset. Usually the #sourceMappingURL comment. [url] is replaced with a URL to the source map file. false disables the appending

oneOf.description: Append no SourceMap comment to the bundle, but still generate SourceMaps

moduleFilenameTemplate.description: Generator string or function to create identifiers of modules for the 'sources' array in the SourceMap

fallbackModuleFilenameTemplate.description: Generator string or function to create identifiers of modules for the 'sources' array in the SourceMap used only if 'moduleFilenameTemplate' would result in a conflict

namespace.description: Namespace prefix to allow multiple webpack roots in the devtools

module.description: Indicates whether SourceMaps from loaders should be used (defaults to true)

columns.description: Indicates whether column mappings should be used (defaults to true)

noSources.description: Omit the 'sourceContents' array from the SourceMap

sourceRoot.description: Provide a custom value for the 'sourceRoot' property in the SourceMap

publicPath.description: Provide a custom public path for the SourceMapping comment

fileContext.description: Path prefix to which the [file] placeholder is relative to

lineToLine.description: (deprecated) try to map original files line to line to generated files

anyOf.description: Simplify and speed up source mapping by using line to line source mappings for matched modules

test.description: Include source maps for modules based on their extension (defaults to .js and .css)

include.description: Include source maps for module paths that match the given value

exclude.description: Exclude modules that match the given value from source map generation
